content: baby will look picture perfect and cuter than any of santa s elves in this festive hat pattern includes two sizes so you can crochet it for toddlers and kids too we like it in other shades for after the holidays as well hat directions are written for size 18 45 5 cm head with changes for size 20 51 cm in parentheses finished hat length from edge of band to tip of hat approximately 19 5 49 5 cm for smaller size and 21 5 54 5 cm for larger size
